channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Path and road damaged for 15m, 23rd July
item.description:
Please hurry along fixing the path and road on Gretton Road. A 15m stretch of path and road is unusable and dangerous to pedestrians, vehicles and cycles. It’s been like this for months and months (perhaps 9 months)Your help is much appreciated by the village residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Gretton Road, Gotherington, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic cones being used as parking space ‘reserves’ and also being thrown and kicked down the street, 23rd July
item.description:
Traffic cones have been here for over two years. Neighbours are using them to save spaces on the road even though they have a drive. The cones are near number 9 and outside number 6
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Cudnall Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Edge of road missing, 23rd July
item.description:
About 5 metres worth of road on the left hand side going towards the old spot pub is missing. A long trench with 2 major pot holes. Https://www.google.co.uk/maps/@51.9464114,-2.1322854,3a,75y,195.37h,87.71t/data=!3m10!1e1!3m8!1s-cmTyJBT5hTgMc_ns_mZqQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fpanoid%3D-cmTyJBT5hTgMc_ns_mZqQ%26cb_client%3Dmaps_sv.share%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26yaw%3D195.36755072967077%26pitch%3D2.29348372970901%26thumbfov%3D90!7i16384!8i8192!9m2!1b1!2i15?coh=205410&entry=ttu
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New Drain Cover is not level, 23rd July
item.description:
This drain is dangerous as it causes the car to bounce off the sunken drain. You should go round the corner without feeling like you have hit a pot hole. This will be more dangerous in winter when the ice has set in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Erosion of brook bank - could it be affecting the bridge, 23rd July
item.description:
/// saves.energy.spend Brook banks eroding - heavy rain causes surges in water. Residents have flagged what they think are gaps appearing in ground around the bridge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Conway Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Filthy outside area & side entrance, 23rd July
item.description:
Block pavement outside library filthy and full of weeds. Side alley leading to ne HUB building covered in leaves and litter. Graffiti on door and wall in side alley.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chester Walk, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple tags & drawings, 23rd July
item.description:
This graffiti has been on the back of the CBC Library for months and detracts from the new HUB building & The Minster

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chester Walk, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temp Lights on New Bar Lane, 23rd July
item.description:
Pavement dug up, no one has been working here for 3 working days. No signage to identify which company to call if lights fail or to re stand fallen barriers. Usual scenario of total lack of regard to public causing unnecessary delays .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, New Barn Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Information board identifying emergency contact company/number not displayed

item.title: Pathway VERY overgrown with trees and thorns., 23rd July
item.description:
The public footpath along this stretch is in need of care. The trees and bushes have taken over! Many of the trees have thorny branches which are rather painful.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Group of street lights out, 23rd July
item.description:
From wheatsheaf pub up to past 307 old bath is in complete darkness a group of street lights on both sides of the road have been out for nearly a month now. Very dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 304, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
